tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  package_id UUID REFERENCES tour_packages(package_id),
  customer_name VARCHAR(100),
  review TEXT,
  rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    package_id INT NOT NULL,
    customer_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    rating INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  package_id INT,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE tour_booking (
  booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  package_id INT,
  guide_id INT,
  booking_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT,
  package_id INT,
  rating INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
);
